page.title: 10TRANSPORT BUS & RAIL
page.content: The area is served by the Crosville zBus Service, British Rail Cambrian Coast and the Narrow Gauge Steam Ffestiniog Railway. 12 buses stop in the village daily on the journey between Pwllheli & B. Ffestiniog.A late bus runs at the weekend. 6 trains each way stop at the station, extra trains run during the holidays. The first train of the day (0755 from Pwllheli) does not run during the summer months. The ffestiniog Railway vary their journeys according to the season. 2 in Feb/March, 3 in March/ May,8 in May/July, 13 in high summer, then the pattarn is reversed. There are special excursions with Father Xmas over the Christmas period.
